turns.text: So uh what kind of home repair work have you done

Yeah okay But youre still getting good bit of the rain though

turns.label: ng

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

Yeah Is it asphalt shingles or or -

Ooh that should be lot of fun

turns.text: No I - uh as matter of fact weve never had leak actually yet Now this - we just bought the house last year and uh uh just before we took possession of it we had fellow go up there and do whatever needed to be done on the shingles So Ive just recently had to start looking at it myself
turns.label: nn

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

Oh its pretty steep Uh parts of it are steeper than others

turns.text: Well uh you wear uh shoes with good traction and and and try to remember where you are at all times
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah I imagine I imagine

turns.text: Yeah yeah that would be just too much of fall for me Um have you been uh - was was the house reasonably new or you been doing some remodeling work on it
turns.label: b

turns.text: Its actually just twelve years old now
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Thats pretty new house yet
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah it uh - this part of the country - actually they say that when the house is uh fifteen its already old but just take good care of it
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: Thing is - weve uh the main thing that weve had with this house recently has been some uh squirming I call it of the foundation Were just on concrete slab you know --
Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- but uh the soil right under this is clay and it uh -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Its settling unevenly
turns.label: qy

turns.text: Well it uh depending on its moisture content it either swells up or shrinks and uh --
turns.label: nd

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- of course the soil right under the slab retains its moisture lot longer --
uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and so during the dry season you have to water the foundation to keep your foundation from uh from uh drooping --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and uh but anytime theres change in the weather like the temperature drastic changes in temperature or in uh moisture uh you get little spider web cracks all around uh windows and doors
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well that sounds like lot of fun
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Well usually what you do is just wait until you think its stopped and then you patch them up
turns.label: sd
